basic.blooming: Carnivorous plants, viewing period year around
basic.color: Flower color red or red purple

maintenance.soil: Soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Turn red or red purple with sufficient sunlight, high mountain varieties need greater temperature difference between day and night
maintenance.watering: Like wet environment, water thoroughly when soil surface is dry, spray water on leaves often
maintenance.fertilization: Can feed by self or provide low concentration liquid fertilizer
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead, rotten, diseased leaves timely
